Title: Allows child day care providers an extension of time to make necessary changes or accommodations to their facility to meet licensing requirements
Summary: Allows child day care providers an extension of time of the original 90 day period to make necessary changes or accommodations to their facility to meet licensing requirements; grants the office of children and family services authority to grant additional extensions of time, if necessary.
LawCode: Amd ยง390, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to allowing child day care providers an extension of time to make necessary changes or accommodations to their facility to meet licensing requirements
